attributes.action: Change the amount of school days in a week from 5 to 4.
attributes.additional_details: We would like for the people in charge to reason and help us change the weeks and add an extra weekend and remove 1 school day to balance the week and weekends.
attributes.background: We would like an extra weekend to balance out the week from 5-2 to 4-3. We are hoping the government can help us with this.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Reduce the school week to four days a week
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727514
